column5: Room #1 was inspired by the rowdy, free spirits from Larry McMurtry's novel Lonesome Dove.  This room has been changed over from a twin to a QUEEN;  limited edition framed artwork  and one of a kind creations adorn the walls, including the unique handmade head board built by ranch owner Kiki Teague and her daughter Rachael.  It has a private bathroom and shower.
column8: Night Bird Ranch B&B #1 Lonesome Dove (QUEEN!)
